name: Contract Signing Session
description: Settings for Therry LLC contract signing

sessionStart.name: Contract Signing Setup
sessionStart.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo ''
echo '=============================================='
echo '   THERRY LLC CONTRACT SIGNING SYSTEM'
echo '=============================================='
echo ''
echo 'Checking prerequisites...'
echo ''

# Create session file
touch .contract-signing-active

# Check GitHub CLI
if ! command -v gh &> /dev/null; then
  echo '❌ GitHub CLI not installed'
  echo '   Please install: https://cli.github.com/'
  echo '   macOS: brew install gh'
  echo '   Ubuntu: sudo apt install gh'
  echo '   Windows: winget install --id GitHub.cli'
  echo ''
else
  echo '✅ GitHub CLI installed'
  # Check auth
  if gh auth status &> /dev/null; then
    echo '✅ GitHub authenticated as:' $(gh api user -q .login)
  else
    echo '⚠️  GitHub not authenticated'
    echo '   You will need to authenticate with GitHub'
    echo '   This includes 2FA if you have it enabled'
    echo ''
  fi
fi

# Check GPG
if ! command -v gpg &> /dev/null; then
  echo '❌ GPG not installed'
  echo '   Please install: brew install gnupg'
  echo ''
else
  echo '✅ GPG installed'
  # Check for key
  if gpg --list-secret-keys 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'sec'; then
    echo '✅ GPG key found'
  else
    echo '⚠️  No GPG key found'
    echo '   You will need to create one'
    echo ''
  fi
fi

# Check Git signing
if [[ $(git config --global commit.gpgsign) == 'true' ]]; then
  echo '✅ Git GPG signing enabled'
else
  echo '⚠️  Git GPG signing not enabled'
  echo '   You will need to configure it'
  echo ''
fi

echo ''
echo '=============================================='
echo ''
echo 'Type "init" to begin the contract signing process'
echo 'I will help you:'
echo '  1. Fix any missing prerequisites'
echo '  2. Clone the necessary repositories'
echo '  3. Sign the operating agreement'
echo ''
echo '=============================================='
